AND (A.ROUT_GRP LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || RG.DL_CD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND B.ROUT_GRP LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
RG.DL_CD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
GROUP BY A.ROUT_GRP, A.DAY_DIV ORDER BY A.ROUT_GRP, A.DAY_DIV, A.WAY_DIV
